step_data.thought: Looking at the current state of the page, I can see I'm now on the product page for Elmwood Inn Fine Teas, Orange Vanilla Caffeine-free Fruit Infusion. To navigate to the reviews section, I need to look for links or tabs related to reviews. In the accessibility tree, I can see a tab labeled 'Reviews (4)' with bid '1665' that contains a link to the reviews section. This tab is part of a tablist at the bottom of the product description. Clicking on this tab will take me to the reviews section.
